body:
I'm a little uneasy with this interface since there isn't clear guidance for how one provides the right value for `idx`. I think that a `public Output[] outputList(String name)` would be a much better interface for this. Though I realize that doing so will require tweaking the underlying C API and/or JNI code.

So no need to change for now, what you have is fine, just making the observation.
body_html:
I'm a little uneasy with this interface since there isn't clear guidance for how one provides the right value for idx. I think that a public Output[] outputList(String name) would be a much better interface for this. Though I realize that doing so will require tweaking the underlying C API and/or JNI code.

So no need to change for now, what you have is fine, just making the observation.
